message: Let's start fair. I'll take 90, and you get 10.  I'm sure we can find a better solution for both of us as we go along.

Alice, your offer was a bit imbalanced. Let's be more realistic. I propose a 70/30 split in my favor.  This round is your best chance to get a decent share before inflation eats into your potential gains.
Okay, Bob, I see you're playing hardball.  I'm willing to meet you halfway, but 70/30 is simply too much. Let's split it 45/55. This is still a good deal for you, considering inflation.
